lines.text: You'll get yours, ya fat dyke bitch!
I'm going Freak-hunting.

[about The Freak]
She's not a bloody army; she's just one woman.
Where's Bea Smith?
Oh, she went to see the Governor.
I hear that she is Top Dog amongst you prisoners, how'd she get that privilege?
Oh, I don't know.
Funny, seems like everyone knows about the famous Bea Smith, except the ones that work with her...
Why don't you ask me? I know *all* about her.
Don't you call me names, ya smart alecky trollop!
Is this a private party or can anyone join in?

[to Frank]
You think sex appeal's a button-day for prostitutes.

[about Kerryn Davies]
She's so up and down we should call her 'Dunny-seat Davies'!
Back off or I'll clobber you
Debbie and Paddy, they're both waiting... both waiting... for you.
[first lines]
She bumped into me.
She won't spoil the wedding but straight after there's going to be a funeral - it's gonna be quite a party.
Desmond, I wouldn't touch you with somebody else's.
Well, you lay a hand on Pixie, and you'll have to use somebody else's!

[about Len Murphy]
Oh, come on, have you seen him? I wouldn't let him touch me with Robert Redford's!
